level.heading: Cooperation and communication among courts.
level.text: Sections 16-4601.10, 16-4601.11, and 16-4601.12 apply to cooperation and communications among courts in proceedings under this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-378, see notes following ยง 16-4604.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 3 of the Uniform Child Abduction Prevention Act. See Vol. 9, Pt. 1A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
